dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3296263B] Abuse Report Please Act!
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] Sent: Monday, March 05, 2007 5:58 AM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3296263B] Abuse Report Please Act! ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Abuse Report Please Act! Added by system at Friday, Mar 2 2007 08:33 am X-MailFrom: v.chaychi@gmail.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Fri Mar 2 08:33:10 2007 Received: (qmail 8274 invoked by alias); 2 Mar 2007 14:33:10 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 8271 invoked from network); 2 Mar 2007 14:33:10 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 2 Mar 2007 14:33:10 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 2 Mar 2007 08:33:10 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Fri, 02 Mar 2007 08:33:10 -0600 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from v.chaychi@gmail.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HN8oo-00029H-0g for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 02 Mar 2007 08:33:10 -0600 Received: from smtp104.rog.mail.re2.yahoo.com ([206.190.36.82]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from v.chaychi@gmail.com) with smtp (Exim) id 1HN8oZ-000CBM-HB for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 02 Mar 2007 08:32:55 -0600 Received: (qmail 20737 invoked from network); 2 Mar 2007 14:30:17 -0000 Received: from unknown (HELO mah) (vahid@rogers.com@74.112.51.211 with login) by smtp104.rog.mail.re2.yahoo.com with SMTP; 2 Mar 2007 14:30:17 -0000 X-YMail-OSG: nBQk9x8VM1m8DNrZZomcc86NNrEOrXMkxya0d2g0LHBKd388WgkJFyEdxAJ8MQwjGw-- Message-ID: <003501c75cf0$7246d6a0$6400a8c0@mah> Reply-To: "Vahid Chaychi" From: "Vahid Chaychi" To: Cc: , Subject: Abuse Report Please Act! Date: Fri, 2 Mar 2007 09:30:10 -0800 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0032_01C75CAD.5F6F8470" X-Priority: 3 X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.2180 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2180 Received-SPF: neutral (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 206.190.36.82 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of gmail.com) client-ip=206.190.36.82; envelope-from=v.chaychi@gmail.com; helo=smtp104.rog.mail.re2.yahoo.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 02 Mar 2007 14:33:10.0249 (UTC) FILETIME=[B37E9590:01C75CD7] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Hello, The below website, hosted/registered by you, has stolen my website content: http://sulaimaneffendi.com For example the content of the below page: http://sulaimaneffendi.com/?p=63 is stolen from one of my website pages at http://www.weboma.com/how-to-close-the-websitesweblogs-that-steal-your-w ebsite-content/ Please act and stop this website and let me know as soon as possible. I will be waiting for one day and then will call my attorney. Regards, Vahid MIME element (text/html)
Hello,
 
The below website, hosted/registered by you, has stolen my website content:
http://sulaimaneffendi.com< /DIV>
 
For example the content of the below page:
http://sulaimaneffendi.com/?p=63
 
is stolen from one of my website pages at
http://www.weboma.com/how-to-close-the-websiteswe blogs-that-steal-your-website-content/
 
Please act and stop this website and let me know as soon as possible. I will be waiting for one day and then will call my attorney.
 
Regards,
Vahid
MIME element (text/plain)
